anya-e0805n5:3_0: Atha ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.
anya-e0805n5:8_1: tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n5:9_3: te pana atthavasā dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā,
anya-e0805n5:9_5: Tatra sakammakā ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā –
anya-e0805n5:9_9: akammakā ye kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadanti, yathā – acchati, seti,
anya-e0805n5:10_0: Te pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṁ?
anya-e0805n5:11_0: Tattha paṭhamaṁ avikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā bhūiccetasmā dhātuto tyādayo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n5:12_0: Bhūsattāyaṁ, ‘‘bhū’’iccayaṁ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
anya-e0805n5:15_3: atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṁ te bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n5:20_0: Anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:21_1: iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
anya-e0805n5:23_0: 426.Vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe.
anya-e0805n5:24_0: Tyādayo dvādasa vattamānāsaññā hontīti tyādīnaṁ vattamānatthavisayattā vattamānāsaññā.
anya-e0805n5:33_0: Idha pana kālassa atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālābhipattivasena chadhā bhinnattā ‘‘paccuppanne’’ti viseseti.
anya-e0805n5:33_1: Taṁ taṁ kāraṇaṁ paṭicca uppanno paccuppanno,
anya-e0805n5:36_1: tassā ṭhānāniyame ‘‘dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti paribhāsato dhātuto paraṁ vattamānappaccaye katvā,
anya-e0805n5:38_0: Atha taddhitānantaraṁ vuccamānānaṁ sabbāsaṁ vattamānādīnaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni,
anya-e0805n5:38_1: tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni parassapadasaññāni hontītiādimhi channaṁ parassapadasaññā,
anya-e0805n5:41_0: Kattarikārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi parassapadaṁ hotīti parassapadaṁ katvā,
anya-e0805n5:44_0: Tāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ parassapadāna’mattanopadānañca dve dve vacanāni yathākkamaṁ paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0805n5:44_9: Evaṁ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe ākhyātapade dvattiṁsa dvattiṁsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā
anya-e0805n5:46_0: Tumhāmhasaddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṁ katvā,
anya-e0805n5:46_1: tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite ‘‘ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana’’nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ti.
anya-e0805n5:47_2: ‘‘yathā kattari cā’’ti ito ‘‘kattarī’’ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n5:49_0: Bhūiccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro apaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n5:52_0: Kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṁyogantānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0805n5:52_2: Ettha ca ‘‘ghaṭādīnaṁ vā’’ti ito vāsaddo anuvattetabbo,
anya-e0805n5:55_0: Yuvaṇṇānampi ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na;
anya-e0805n5:60_0: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n5:60_1: ‘‘Saralopo mādesa’’iccādinā saralopādimhi kate ‘‘naye paraṁ yutte’’ti paranayanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:61_0: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṁ cittaṁ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:65_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṁ bahuttā ‘‘bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana’’nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṁ anti,
anya-e0805n5:68_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi majjhimapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacanaṁsi,
anya-e0805n5:72_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi uttamapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṁ mi,
anya-e0805n5:74_0: Akāro dīghamāpajjate himimaiccetāsu vibhattīsu. Ahaṁ bhavāmi, mayaṁ bhavāma. Bhavāmi, bhavāma.
anya-e0805n5:77_0: Sabbāsaṁ vattamānānaṁ aṭṭhavidhānaṁ vibhattīnaṁ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni,
anya-e0805n5:77_1: tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni hontīti teādīnaṁ attanopadasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:80_0: Kattari ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0805n5:80_2: sesaṁ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:81_4: So devadatto odanaṁ pacati, pacanti, pacasi , pacatha, pacāmi, pacāma,
anya-e0805n5:84_2: majjhimuttamānaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā purisānaṁ ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0805n5:84_5: tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge tumhe pacathāti bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:85_3: ahaṁ paciṁ’’ ettha bhinnakālattā ‘‘mayaṁ pacimhā’’ti na bhavati.
anya-e0805n5:86_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṁ dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0805n5:89_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussanto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu,
anya-e0805n5:90_0: Vidhiṁ niccañca vāsaddo, māna’ntesu tu kattari;
anya-e0805n5:92_3: ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa re vā hoti, gacchare.
anya-e0805n5:93_0: Cchādesābhāve ‘‘lopañcettamakāro’’ti appaccayassa ekāro. Gameti, gamenti, saralopo. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n5:94_0: Attanopadepi so gāmaṁ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:95_0: ‘‘Kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī’’tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:98_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:101_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti,
anya-e0805n5:101_3: so ca kārakantarena asaṁsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho.
anya-e0805n5:101_6: tasmā kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto vattamānattanopadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ te.
anya-e0805n5:104_2: ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti sutte anuvattitavāggahaṇena yappaccaye vuddhi na bhavati,
anya-e0805n5:113_0: Pacadhātuto kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:116_0: Tassa bhāvakammavisayassa yappaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṁ hoti dhātvantena saha yathāsambhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:116_1: Ettha ca ‘‘ivaṇṇāgamo vā’’ti ito sīhagatiyā vāsaddo anuvattetabbo,
anya-e0805n5:117_0: Cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṁ, dhātvantānaṁ yavattanaṁ;
anya-e0805n5:119_0: Dhātvantassa cavaggādittā cakāre kate ‘‘paradvebhāvo ṭhāne’’ti cakārassa dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:119_2: ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci re hoti. Paccare, paccante. Paccase, paccavhe. Pacce, paccāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:120_0: Parassapadādese paccati, paccanti. Paccasi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n5:120_1: Tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. Paccati,
anya-e0805n5:121_0: Gamito kammani attanopade, yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n5:124_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṁ bhāvakammavisaye yappaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo.
anya-e0805n5:128_1: tena kaṭapavaggayakāralasanteheva dhātūhi paro yappaccayo pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti makārā parassa yakārassa makāro. Gammate, gamīyate, gammante,
anya-e0805n5:131_0: 450.Pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṁ antaṁ, ssuvho, e āmase.
anya-e0805n5:134_0: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe anuttakāle pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:135_0: Satipi kālādhikāre puna kālaggahaṇena vidhinimantanājjhesanānumatipatthanāpattakālādīsu ca pañcamī.
anya-e0805n5:135_3: so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa atthassa patthanaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:142_0: Āṇattiyaṁ kattari devadatto dāni odanaṁ pacatu, pacantu. Paca, pacāhi, pacatha. Pacāmi, pacāma. Pacataṁ, pacantaṁ. Pacassu, pacavho. Pace, pacāmase.
anya-e0805n5:143_4: Parassapadatte paccatu, paccantu. Pacca, paccāhi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n5:144_2: gacchatha. Gacchāmi, gacchāma. Gametu, gamentu. Gama, gamāhi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n5:145_0: Kammani gacchīyataṁ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṁ, gamīyatu, gammataṁ, gammatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:146_0: Vidhimhi idha pabbato hotu, ayaṁ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
anya-e0805n5:147_0: Nimantane adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṁ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:149_0: Anumatiyaṁ pucchatu bhavaṁ pañhaṁ, pavisatu bhavaṁ, ettha nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n5:150_0: Patthanā yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṁ me nayanaṁ dehi.
anya-e0805n5:151_0: Pattakāle sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṁ karotu bhavaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:153_0: 453.Sattamī eyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁeyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:157_0: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:159_2: ‘‘kvaci dhātu vibhattī’’tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṁiccetesaṁ vikappena ekārādeso.
anya-e0805n5:159_3: So dāni kiṁ nu kho bhave,
anya-e0805n5:160_0: Patthane tu ahaṁ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṁ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:162_0: Vidhimhi so odanaṁ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:164_8: gaccheyyāma. Game, gameyya, gamuṁ, gameyyuṁ. Game,
anya-e0805n5:168_0: 455.Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṁmhā, tthatthuṁ, sevhaṁ, iṁmhase.
anya-e0805n5:172_0: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā hiyyattanīvibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ā.
anya-e0805n5:175_0: Kvaci dhātūnamādimhi akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n5:181_0: Tathā so odanaṁ apacā, pacā, apacū, pacū. Apaco, paco,
anya-e0805n5:181_1: apacattha, pacattha. Apacaṁ, pacaṁ, apacamhā, pacamhā.
anya-e0805n5:187_0: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātukasaññā hontīti hiyyattanādīnaṁ sabbadhātukasaññattā ‘‘ikārāgamo
anya-e0805n5:189_0: 459.Parokkhā a u, e ttha, aṁ mha, ttha re, tho vho, iṁmhe.
anya-e0805n5:192_0: Apaccakkhe vattuno indriyāvisayabhūte atīte kāle parokkhāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n5:197_0: Kha cha sesu parokkhāyaṁ, dvebhāvo sabbadhātunaṁ;
anya-e0805n5:201_0: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo avayavo, so abbhāsasañño hotīti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n5:204_0: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti vā, akāro ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n5:211_0: Abbhāsagatānaṁ dutiyacatutthānaṁ vaggabyañjanānaṁ yathākkamaṁ paṭhamatatiyā hontīti bhakārassa bakāro.
anya-e0805n5:213_0: Brūbhūiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti parokkhāvibhattiyanti bhūsaddassa bhūvaādeso,
anya-e0805n5:216_0: Sabbasmiṁ asabbadhātukamhi pare kvaci dhātūhi paro ikārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n5:219_0: Ettha ca ‘‘na sabbadhātukaṁ asabbadhātuka’’miti katvā ‘‘hiyyattanī sattamī pañcamī vattamānā sabbadhātuka’’nti
anya-e0805n5:219_1: hiyyattanīādīnaṁ sabbadhātukasaññāya vuttattā tadaññā catasso vibhattiyo asabbadhātukanti vuccati.
anya-e0805n5:221_2: yappaccayassa asabbadhātukamhi ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā lope kate ivaṇṇāgamo na bhavati,
anya-e0805n5:223_0: Kammani papaccittha, papaccire iccādi. Tathā apacca, apaccū iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:227_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa cavaggo hotīti vakārassa jakāro,
anya-e0805n5:230_0: 468.Ajjatanī ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ, amhe.
anya-e0805n5:234_0: Samīpe samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanīvibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṁ ī.
anya-e0805n5:238_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi uṁvibhattissa iṁsvādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:239_3: Tvaṁ abhavi, bhavi vā, abhavo, bhavo vā,
anya-e0805n5:239_14: bhavittha vā, abhavā, bhavā vā, abhavū, bhavū vā. Abhavise,
anya-e0805n5:241_0: So apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā,
anya-e0805n5:241_2: Tvaṁ apaci, paci, apaco, paco vā,
anya-e0805n5:241_7: So apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū. Apacise,
anya-e0805n5:241_8: apacivhaṁ. Apacaṁ, pacaṁ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.
anya-e0805n5:242_2: Parassapadatte apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī vā,
anya-e0805n5:242_3: apacciṁsu, pacciṁsu, apaccuṁ, paccuṁ. Apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā,
anya-e0805n5:244_0: ‘‘Kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ajjatanimhi gamissa cchassa kvaci ñchādeso, agañchi, gañchi, agañchī,
anya-e0805n5:245_0: Cchādesābhāve so agami, gami, agamī, gamī vā,
anya-e0805n5:245_2: ‘‘sattamajjatanimhī’’ti yogavibhāgena vā sāgame ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā byañjanato ākārāgamo, agamāsi,
anya-e0805n5:245_4: ucāgamo tthamhesu kvaci, agamiṁsu, gamiṁsu, agamaṁsu, gamaṁsu, agamuṁ, gamuṁ,
anya-e0805n5:245_5: tvaṁ agami, gami, agamo, gamo vā,
anya-e0805n5:245_8: Ahaṁ agamiṁ, gamiṁ, agamimha, gamimha, agamumha, gamumha, agamimhā,
anya-e0805n5:247_4: Cchādesābhāve so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, ajjhagū, agū.
anya-e0805n5:251_4: mā bhavissatīti vā atthe hiyyattanajjatanīpañcamī vibhattiyo,
anya-e0805n5:251_7: mā te bhavantvantarāyā. Mā pacā, mā pacī,
anya-e0805n5:251_12: Mā kañci pāpamāgamā, mā agami, mā gamā, mā gamī,
anya-e0805n5:253_0: 472.Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁssāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:267_0: 484.Kālātipatti ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁssāmhase.
anya-e0805n5:270_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi na kriyā atītasaddena voharitabbā,
anya-e0805n5:270_4: tathāpi takkiriyuppattippaṭibandhakarakriyāya kālabhedena atītavohāro labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:274_0: Tathā so ce taṁ dhanaṁ alabhissa,
anya-e0805n5:283_0: Isu icchākantīsu, pure viya dhātvantalopo, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n5:286_0: Isuyamuiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto ccho hoti vā.
anya-e0805n5:286_3: So saggaṁ icchati, icchanti. Icchasi, icchatha. Icchāmi, icchāma.
anya-e0805n5:287_5: Parokkhāhiyyattanīsu pana rūpāni sabbattha payogamanugamma payojetabbāni, icchi, esi.
anya-e0805n5:290_2: rassattaṁ. Acchati, acchanti. Acchasi, acchatha. Acchāmi, acchāma.
anya-e0805n5:290_5: upāsīyati. Acchatu, upāsatu. Accheyya, upāseyya. Acchī, upāsī.
anya-e0805n5:291_0: Labha lābhe, labhati, labhanti. Labhasi, labhatha. Labhāmi, labhāma. Labhate, labhante. Labhase, labhavhe. Labhe, labhāmhe.
anya-e0805n5:292_0: Kamme yakārassa pubbarūpatte kate ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā purimabhakārassa bakāro, labbhate,
anya-e0805n5:295_0: Labhaiccetasmā dhātuto paresaṁ īiṁnaṁ vibhattīnaṁ ttha tthaṁiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n5:295_1: dhātvantassa lopo ca. Alattha, alabhi, labhi,
anya-e0805n5:295_2: alabhiṁsu, labhiṁsu. Alabho, labho, alabhi, labhi,
anya-e0805n5:296_0: Bhavissantimhi ‘‘karassa sappaccayassa kāho’’ti ettha sappaccayaggahaṇena vaca muca bhujādito ssassakhādeso,
anya-e0805n5:296_1: vasa chida labhādito chādeso ca vā hotīti ssassa chādeso,
anya-e0805n5:296_2: ‘‘byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā’’ti dhātvantassa cakāro, lacchati,
anya-e0805n5:297_0: Vaca viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi, vacatha. Vacāmi, vacāma.
anya-e0805n5:300_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakārassa ukāro hoti yappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n5:300_2: ‘‘Vassa a va’’iti samāsena dutiyañcettha vaggahaṇaṁ icchitabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:300_5: ‘‘Tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadhātvantassa yakārassa cakāro, dvittaṁ. Uccate, uccante. Vuccate, vuccante. Vuccati,
anya-e0805n5:300_7: Tathā vacatu, vuccatu. Vaceyya, vucceyya. Avacā, avaccā, avacū, avaccū. Avaca, avaco,
anya-e0805n5:302_0: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi. Avoci, avocuṁ. Avoco,
anya-e0805n5:303_1: ‘‘byañjanantassā’’ti vattamāne ‘‘ko khe cā’’ti dhātvantassa kādeso, vakkhati,
anya-e0805n5:305_0: Kamme uttaṁ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. Vasatu. Vaseyya. Avasi, vasi.
anya-e0805n5:307_0: Tathā ruda assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. Rodissati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:308_0: Kusa akkose, āpubbo dvittarassattāni, appaccayavuddhiyo ca. Akkosati. Akkosatu. Akkoseyya.
anya-e0805n5:311_0: Kusa iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa cchiādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n5:316_5: ‘‘vacavasa’’iccādinā uttaṁ. Vuyhati, vulhati, vuyhanti. Vahatu, vuyhatu. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Avahī,
anya-e0805n5:319_0: Jaramara iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ jīrajīyyamīyyādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n5:319_2: ‘‘Kvacā’’disuttena ekayakārassa kvaci lopo hoti. Jīyati, jīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:320_3: jīyiyyanti. Jīratu, jīyyatu. Jīreyya, jīyyeyya. Ajīrī, jīrī, jīyyī.
anya-e0805n5:321_0: Mara pāṇacāge, mīyyādeso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. Mīyati, mīyanti vā. Marati, maranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:324_0: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:324_2: tena dissādeso kammani sabbadhātuke eva. Passati, passanti. Dakkhati,
anya-e0805n5:325_0: Kammani yakāralopo, dissate, dissante. Dissati, dissanti.
anya-e0805n5:326_0: Hiyyattaniyaṁ ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dhātuikārassa attaṁ, addasā, addasa. Kammani adissa.
anya-e0805n5:332_0: Sadaiccetassa dhātussa sīdādeso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci.
anya-e0805n5:332_4: idha kvacādhikārena sīdā-deso na bhavati. Nisīdatu. Nisīde. Nisīdi.
anya-e0805n5:336_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa yakārassa ikārādeso hoti yappaccaye pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n5:336_2: Tathā yajatu, ijjataṁ. Yaje, ijjetha. Yaji, ijjittha.
anya-e0805n5:337_0: Vada viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n5:340_0: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n5:346_0: Appaccayassa ekāro, saralopādi, vajjeti, vadeti, vadati, antimhi –
anya-e0805n5:348_1: kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:348_3: dhātuvihitappaccayānañca dīghatabbiparītaādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpato bhavanti. Tattha –
anya-e0805n5:350_0: Āyūnaṁ vā vibhattīnaṁ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā.
anya-e0805n5:351_0: Gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā;
anya-e0805n5:352_0: Ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṁ yamhi dīghatā.
anya-e0805n5:354_0: Okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe.
anya-e0805n5:355_0: Tathā brūtoti antīnaṁ, au vāha ca dhātuyā;
anya-e0805n5:359_0: Ekārato parassa antiakārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti. Vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi, vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha. Vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.
anya-e0805n5:360_2: Vadīyati vā. Vajjetu, vadetu, vadatu. Vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya,
anya-e0805n5:367_2: e’’ti ca adhikicca ‘‘te āvāyā’’ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ekārassa āyādeso, jhāyati,
anya-e0805n5:369_2: ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti etthānuvattita vāggahaṇena tudādīnaṁ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti. Tudasi, tudatha. Tudāmi, tudāma.
anya-e0805n5:370_0: Kamme ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadakārassa yappaccayassa jakāro dvittaṁ, tujjate, tujjante. Tujjati, tujjanti,
anya-e0805n5:370_2: Tathā tudatu, tudantu. Tude, tudeyya, tudeyyuṁ. Atudi, tudiṁsu. Atudi,
anya-e0805n5:371_0: Visa pavesane papubbo, so gāmaṁ pavisati, pavisanti. Pavisasi, pavisatha. Pavisāmi, pavisāma.
anya-e0805n5:379_4: ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti vuddhi. So hoti, te honti,
anya-e0805n5:379_5: ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā parasarassa lopo. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa.
anya-e0805n5:380_0: Tathā hotu, hontu. Hohi, anakāraparattā hilopo na bhavati, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyataṁ.
anya-e0805n5:381_0: Sattamiyaṁ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṁ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Heyyaṁ vā. Bhāve hūyetha.
anya-e0805n5:382_0: Hiyyattaniyaṁappaccayalope ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā hūdhātussa ūkārassa uvādeso. Ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvū. Ahuva, ahuvo,
anya-e0805n5:383_0: Ajjatanimhi ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā hūto īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṁ, so ahu,
anya-e0805n5:383_1: lopābhāve ‘‘karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī’’ti ettha ‘‘sattamajjatanimhī’’ti yogavibhāgena sāgamo, vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṁ,
anya-e0805n5:384_0: ‘‘Hi lopaṁ vā’’ti ito ‘‘lopo, vā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:386_0: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro eha oha ettamāpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n5:387_0: Hehiti, hehinti. Hehisi, hehitha. Hehāmi, hehāma.
anya-e0805n5:387_7: hehissāma. Ohādese – hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi, hohitha. Hohāmi, hohāma.
anya-e0805n5:387_14: Ekārādese – heti, henti. Hesi, hetha. Hemi , hema. Hessati, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha. Hessāmi, hessāma.
anya-e0805n5:391_0: Sī saye appaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. Sesi, setha. Semi, sema. Sete, sente iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:395_0: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n5:395_1: saralopādi. Sayati, sayanti. Sayasi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma.
anya-e0805n5:397_0: Tathā setu, sentu. Sehi, setha. Semi, sema. Sayatu, sayantu. Saya, sayāhi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma. Sayataṁ, sayantaṁ. Sayassu, sayavho. Saye, sayāmase.
anya-e0805n5:398_0: Saye, sayeyya, sayeyyuṁ. Atisīyeyya. Bhāve sīyetha.
anya-e0805n5:402_2: ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti, nenti. Nesi, netha. Nemi, nema.
anya-e0805n5:402_5: Kamme nīyate gāmaṁ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante. Nīyati, nīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:403_0: Tathā netu, nayatu. Nīyataṁ, nīyantaṁ. Naye, nayeyya. Nīyetha, nīyeyya. Anayi, nayi, anayiṁsu, nayiṁsu. Vinesi, vinesuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:406_4: Lopābhāve ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ṭhāto hakārāgamo ca rassattaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:408_0: 493.Yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī.
anya-e0805n5:409_0: Bhāvakammavisaye yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ anto īkāramāpajjate,
anya-e0805n5:413_0: Pāiccetassa dhātussa pibādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n5:414_1: ‘‘Kvaci dhātvā’’dinā bakārassa vakāro, pivati, pivanti. Pāti, pānti, panti vā. Pīyate, pīyante. Pīyati, pīyanti. Pivatu. Piveyya. Apāyi, pivi.
anya-e0805n5:415_0: Asa bhuvi, vibhattuppatti, appaccayalopo, asa itīdha –
anya-e0805n5:418_0: Asaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa tissa vibhattissa tthittaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthi.
anya-e0805n5:421_0: Sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca asaiccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā,
anya-e0805n5:424_0: Asadhātussa antalopo hoti simhi vibhattimhi ca. Tvaṁ asi.
anya-e0805n5:426_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa thassa vibhattissa tthattaṁ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Tumhe attha.
anya-e0805n5:429_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṁ mi maiccetāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ mhimhaiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n5:429_1: dhātvantassa lopo ca. Amhi, amha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n5:431_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0805n5:431_2: Asassādilopo ca, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n5:432_1: ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā asato eyyaeyyuṁ vibhattīnaṁ iyāiyuñca honti. Siyā, siyuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:433_0: Lopābhāve ‘‘kvaci dhātvā’’dinā asato eyyādīnaṁ sadhātvantānaṁ ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṁ ssāmaādesā honti.
anya-e0805n5:434_0: Evamassa vacanīyo, assu. Assa, assatha. Assaṁ, assāma.
anya-e0805n5:435_0: Ajjataniyaṁ akārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṁsu, āsuṁ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṁ, āsimha.
anya-e0805n5:438_0: Asasseva dhātussa bhūādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavissa, abhavissaṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:440_0: Brū viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayalopo ca.
anya-e0805n5:443_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi kvaci,
anya-e0805n5:443_3: ‘‘aññesu cā’’ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena brūdhātussa byañjane vuddhi na hoti,
anya-e0805n5:443_4: bahuvacane ‘‘jhalānamiyuvā sare vā’’ti ūkārassa sare uvādeso, bruvanti.
anya-e0805n5:443_5: ‘‘Kvaci dhātvā’’dinā brūto tiantīnaṁ vā a u ādesā brūssa āhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n5:444_0: Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvavhe. Bruve, brūmhe. Brūtu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:446_0: Ajjataniyaṁ abravi, abruvi, abravuṁ. Bravissati. Abravissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:447_1: timhi kvaci appaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti. Hanasi, hanatha. Hanāmi, hanāma.
anya-e0805n5:448_1: dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare. Haññati, haññanti. Hanatu, hanantu. Haneyya.
anya-e0805n5:451_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa vadhādeso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n5:456_0: Hakārassa abbhāse vattamānassa jo hoti. ‘‘Lopañcetta makāro’’ti appaccayalopo, vuddhi. Juhoti.
anya-e0805n5:459_0: Jhalasaññānaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ yakāravakārādesā honti sare pareti apadantassa ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n5:460_0: Juhvati, juhoti, juhvanti, juhonti. Juhvasi, juhosi, juhvatha, juhotha. Juhvāmi, juhomi, juhvāma, juhoma.
anya-e0805n5:461_0: Kamme ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. Hūyati, hūyanti.
anya-e0805n5:462_1: juhvantu vā. Juhe, juheyya, juheyyuṁ. Ajuhavi, ajuhavuṁ. Ajuhosi, ajuhosuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:463_0: Hā cāge, pure viya dvebhāvajādesa appaccayalopā.
anya-e0805n5:467_0: Jahāti, jahanti. Jahāsi, jahātha. Jahāmi, jahāma.
anya-e0805n5:468_0: Kamme ‘‘yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpāmahamathādīnamī’’ti dhātvantassa īkāro. Hīyate, hīyante, hīyare. Hīyati, hīyanti.
anya-e0805n5:469_0: Tathā jahātu, jahantu. Jahe, jaheyya, jaheyyuṁ. Hīyetha, hīyeyya. Ajahāsi, ajahiṁsu, ajahāsuṁ. Pajahi,
anya-e0805n5:470_3: appaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0805n5:473_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā,
anya-e0805n5:473_2: appaccayalopo. Dajjati, dajjanti. Dajjasi, dajjatha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma.
anya-e0805n5:476_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṁ hoti vā mimaiccetesu paresu,
anya-e0805n5:476_1: niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ. Dammi, damma. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n5:477_0: Kamme ‘‘yamhi dādhā’’iccādinā īkāro, dīyate, dīyante. Dīyati, dīyanti. Dīyyate, dīyyante. Dīyyati,
anya-e0805n5:478_0: Dadātu , dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadataṁ, dadantaṁ. Dadassu, dadavho. Dade, dadāmase. Dajjatu,
anya-e0805n5:478_1: dajjantu iccādi. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n5:480_7: Dvittābhāve deyya, deyyuṁ. Deyyāsi, deyyātha. Dīyetha, dīyeyya.
anya-e0805n5:482_1: adajjiṁsu. Adāsi, adaṁsu. Adāsi, ado, adittha. Adāsiṁ, adāsimha, adamha.
anya-e0805n5:483_6: Rassattaṁ, dassati, dassanti. Dassasi, dassatha. Dassāmi, dassāma. Dassate.
anya-e0805n5:487_0: Tathā dadhātu, pidahatu, nidhetu, nidhentu. Dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe,
anya-e0805n5:487_1: pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya. Dadhāsi, pidahi. Dhassati,
anya-e0805n5:489_0: Avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo;
anya-e0805n5:493_0: Rudha āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:496_1: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato appaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n5:496_2: niggahītañca tato pubbaṁ hutvā āgamo hoti,
anya-e0805n5:496_3: tañca niggahītaṁ pakatiyā sarānugatattā dhātussarato paraṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n5:498_0: Kamme nipubbo yappaccayassa ‘‘tassa cavagga’’iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate ‘‘vagge ghosā’’tiādinā dvittaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:502_0: Yuja yoge, yuñjati, yuñjanti. Yujjate, yujjante. Yujjati, yujjanti. Yuñjatu. Yujjataṁ. Yuñje. Yujjetha. Ayuñji,
anya-e0805n5:504_0: Bhavissantiyaṁ ‘‘karassa sappaccayassa kāho’’ti sutte sappaccayaggahaṇena bhujato ssassa khādeso,
anya-e0805n5:505_0: Muca mocane, muñcati, muñcanti. Muccate, muccante. Muñcatu, muñcantu. Muccataṁ,
anya-e0805n5:510_0: Divādito dhātugaṇato yappaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:511_0: ‘‘Yaggahaṇaṁ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṁ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa’’nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:513_1: tathā kattaripi yappaccayassa sadhātvantassa cavagga yakāravakārādeso,
anya-e0805n5:513_2: pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa vakārattā saha tena yakārassa vakāre kate dvibhāvo,
anya-e0805n5:513_3: ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti ettha caggahaṇena ‘‘bo vassā’’ti vuttattā vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṁ, dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbasi, dibbatha. Dibbāmi, dibbāma.
anya-e0805n5:514_0: Kamme dibbate, dibbante. Dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbatu. Dibbataṁ. Dibbe. Dibbetha. Adibbi.
anya-e0805n5:515_0: Sivu tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. Sibbatu. Sibbeyya. Asibbi, sibbi.
anya-e0805n5:516_0: Pada gatimhi, upubbo dvittaṁ, ‘‘tathā kattari cā’’ti sadhātvantassa yakārassa jakāro, dvittañca.
anya-e0805n5:518_0: Kamme paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. Paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. Bhāve uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0805n5:525_0: Naha bandhane, ‘‘ha vipariyayo’’ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. Sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:526_0: Mana ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:528_0: Tusa pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṁ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:531_1: ‘‘janādīnamā timhi cā’’ti ettha ‘‘janādīnamā’’ti yogavibhāgena yamhi dhātvantassa ākāro. Jāyati, jāyanti. Jāyate, jāyante.
anya-e0805n5:537_0: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇāuṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n5:538_1: saralopādi, suṇanti. Suṇosi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma.
anya-e0805n5:538_3: ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā rassattaṁ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma.
anya-e0805n5:539_0: Kamme yappaccaye ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante. Sūyati, sūyanti.
anya-e0805n5:540_0: Suṇotu, suṇantu. Suṇohi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Suṇa, suṇāhi, suṇātha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma. Suṇataṁ,
anya-e0805n5:543_12: Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sossati, sossanti. Sossasi, sossatha. Sossāmi, sossāma. Sossate.
anya-e0805n5:546_0: Mi pakkhepe, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā ṇassa nattaṁ, minoti, minanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:549_8: ‘‘Kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā sakantassa khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi,
anya-e0805n5:552_0: Kī dabbavinimaye, vipubbo dvittaṁ, pure viya vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:554_0: Kīicceva mādito dhātugaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari.
anya-e0805n5:556_2: Evaṁ jinātu. Jīyatu. Jineyya. Jīyeyya. Ajini, jini, ajiniṁsu, jiniṁsu. Ajesi, ajesuṁ.
anya-e0805n5:557_0: Tathā ci caye, cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:561_0: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṁ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:562_0: Jādeso nāmhi jaṁ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha;
anya-e0805n5:567_0: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāiccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Vijāniyā.
anya-e0805n5:571_0: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā,
anya-e0805n5:578_0: Mā māne, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā māntassa ikāro, mināti, minanti. Kamme mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:579_0: Lū chedane, nāmhi rassattaṁ, lunāti, lunanti. Lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:580_0: Dhū kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. Dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:583_0: Gahaiccevamādito dhātuto ppa ṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari. Ādisaddoyaṁ pakāro.
anya-e0805n5:586_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:586_2: rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti. Gaṇhāsi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
anya-e0805n5:587_0: Kamme ‘‘ye’’ti vattamāne ‘‘havipariyayo lo vā’’ti hakārassa yakārena vipariyayo hoti. Gayhati, gayhanti.
anya-e0805n5:588_0: Gaṇhātu, gaṇhantu. Gaṇha, gaṇhāhi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma. Gaṇhataṁ,
anya-e0805n5:593_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gheādeso hoti ppappaccaye pare. Gheppati iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:598_0: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato oyiraiccete paccayā honti kattari. Karatovāyaṁ yirappaccayo.
anya-e0805n5:599_0: Dhammaṁ tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma.
anya-e0805n5:602_2: Ettha ca vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato ‘‘okāro’’ti ovikaraṇaṁ gayhati. Tanute,
anya-e0805n5:602_3: bahuvacane ‘‘yavakārā cā’’ti vattaṁ, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanumhe.
anya-e0805n5:603_0: Kamme ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā tanudhātvantassa yamhi ākāro, patāyate,
anya-e0805n5:603_4: pataññanti. Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, taneyyuṁ. Atani, ataniṁsu.
anya-e0805n5:608_4: vakārassa dvitte tassa ‘‘bbo vvassā’’ti bakāradvayaṁ, kubbanti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, karoma.
anya-e0805n5:608_5: Tathā kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kubbe, kurumhe.
anya-e0805n5:610_1: kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Kurutaṁ,
anya-e0805n5:611_0: Kamme karīyatu, karīyantu, kayyataṁ, kayirataṁ, kayiratu.
anya-e0805n5:617_0: Hiyyattaniyaṁ ‘‘karassa kā’’ti yogavibhāgena kā hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n5:618_1: akarottha. Akaṁ, akaraṁ, akamha, akaramha. Akattha. Akariṁ,
anya-e0805n5:621_0: Kara iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva kāsattaṁ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare.
anya-e0805n5:621_2: Atha vā yadā karassa kā hoti,
anya-e0805n5:621_4: tadā ‘‘sattamajjatanimhī’’ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamopi sijjhati,
anya-e0805n5:621_6: ‘‘karassa kā’’ti yogavibhāgena kābhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṁ siddho hoti.
anya-e0805n5:622_3: Kāsattābhāve akari, kari, akariṁsu, kariṁsu, akaṁsu, akaruṁ. Akari,
anya-e0805n5:623_0: ‘‘Vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n5:625_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sappaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi,
anya-e0805n5:625_3: vasa chidi labhādito chādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0805n5:626_0: Kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma.
anya-e0805n5:627_1: tadā ‘‘purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā’’ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi saṁpubbakarotissa kharādeso.
anya-e0805n5:629_0: Saka sattimhi, opaccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. Sakkosi, sakkotha. Sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:630_0: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo, pappoti, papponti. Papposi, pappotha. Pappomi, pappoma. Pappotu,
anya-e0805n5:633_0: Dhura theyye, pure viya dhātvantalopo, vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n5:634_0: ‘‘Tathā kattari cā’’ti ito ‘‘kattarī’’ti ca sīhavilokanena bhāvakammaggahaṇāni ca vattante,
anya-e0805n5:636_0: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari,
anya-e0805n5:640_0: Asaṁyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:641_0: Dhanaṁ coreti, corenti. Coresi, coretha. Coremi, corema.
anya-e0805n5:642_0: Kamme yappaccaye īkārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:643_0: Coretu , corentu. Corehi. Corayatu, corayantu. Coraya, corayāhi.
anya-e0805n5:644_1: corayeyyuṁ. Acoresi, coresi, acoresuṁ, coresuṁ. Acorayi, corayi,
anya-e0805n5:646_0: Tathā cinta cintāyaṁ, saṁyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.
anya-e0805n5:648_0: Manta guttabhāsane, manteti, mantayati iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:649_0: Pāla rakkhaṇe, dhammaṁ pāleti, pālayati. Pālīyati. Pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:650_0: Ghaṭa ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
anya-e0805n5:652_0: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, ‘‘ghaṭādīnaṁ vā’’ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:654_0: Bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā;
anya-e0805n5:655_0: Kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā.
anya-e0805n5:659_0: Tattha dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhā khādikāritantā paccayā dhātuppaccayā nāma.
anya-e0805n5:661_0: ‘‘Dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti ito dhātuggahaṇaṁ anuvattate, ‘‘parā, paccayā’’ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n5:662_0: 528.Tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0805n5:663_0: Tija gupa kita māna iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:664_0: Tijato khantiyaṁ khova, nindāyaṁ gupato tu cho;
anya-e0805n5:669_0: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa kakārādeso hoti khappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:673_0: Dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi khādikāritantehi paccayehi tyādayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0805n5:675_0: Khappaccayābhāve appaccayassa ekāro, tejeti, tejati vā, tejanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:678_0: Dhātvanthassa byañjanassa cakārādeso hoti chappaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n5:682_0: Abbhāsagatānaṁ māna kitaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ vakāratakārattaṁ hoti vā yathākkamanti takāro,
anya-e0805n5:685_0: Tato abbhāsato parāsaṁ pāmānānaṁ dhātūnaṁ vāmaṁiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṁ sappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:690_0: Bhuja ghasa hara su pā iccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu ca kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n5:690_5: dhātvādissa dvebhāve kate ‘‘dutiyacatutthānaṁ paṭhamatatiyā’’ti abbhāsabhakārassa bakāro,
anya-e0805n5:691_0: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Bhottumicchati, icchatthesūti kimatthaṁ? Bhottuṁ gacchati.
anya-e0805n5:695_0: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gī hoti se paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n5:696_0: Su savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, ‘‘kvaci dhātū’’tiādinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n5:699_0: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n5:701_0: Ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato āyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe.
anya-e0805n5:701_4: dhātuppaccayantattā ‘‘tesaṁ vibhattiyo lopā cā’’ti sutte tesaṁgahaṇena vibhattilopo,
anya-e0805n5:705_0: Upamānāti kiṁ? Dhammamācarati, ācāreti kiṁ? Achattaṁ chattamiva rakkhati.
anya-e0805n5:713_2: tena atikkamati’’iccādike payujjitabbe vā sati nāmamhā ṇayappaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n5:714_0: 540.Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0805n5:715_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti,
anya-e0805n5:715_3: so ca ‘‘yo kāreti sa hetū’’ti laddhahetusañño suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā,
anya-e0805n5:715_4: atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
anya-e0805n5:717_0: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṁ;
anya-e0805n5:719_0: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
anya-e0805n5:722_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
anya-e0805n5:725_2: atha vā bhavantaṁ bhavituṁ samatthaṁ payojayati,
anya-e0805n5:725_3: bhavituṁ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā,
anya-e0805n5:728_0: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare.
anya-e0805n5:728_1: ‘‘Te āvāyā’’ti yogavibhāgena jheādīnaṁ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso,
anya-e0805n5:740_0: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṁsu, abhāvayissaṁsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n5:741_3: pacituṁ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo,
anya-e0805n5:742_0: So devadattaṁ odanaṁ pāceti, pācenti. Pācesi, pācetha. Pācemi, pācema. Pācayati,
anya-e0805n5:742_3: Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṁ purisaṁ odanaṁ pācāpeti,
anya-e0805n5:743_0: Kamme so odanaṁ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
anya-e0805n5:745_0: Gacchantaṁ, gantuṁ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṁ sampattāyaṁ –
anya-e0805n5:748_0: Ghaṭādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ asaṁyogantānaṁ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti,
anya-e0805n5:749_0: So taṁ purisaṁ gāmaṁ gameti, gamayati,
anya-e0805n5:753_0: Guhadusaiccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṁ.
anya-e0805n5:756_0: Tathā tudantaṁ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti,
anya-e0805n5:760_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare. Ghāteti,
anya-e0805n5:764_0: Suṇantaṁ payojayati dhammaṁ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṁ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
anya-e0805n5:777_0: Taṁ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṁ rāgādidūsakanti.
